pages.text: A wearable item that offers a small amount of protection and can be $(item)enchanted$(). It can be repaired by using $(item)Leather$() in an $(item)Anvil$() or by crafting with three $(l:resources/impregnated_leather)Impregnated Leather$(/l).

pages.title: Special Properties
pages.text: When worn, the Witches' Hat provides an improved chance of creating an additional brew when using the $(l:kettle/kettle_intro)Kettle$(/l).$(p)The piece becomes invisible when the creature that wears it is invisible.

When worn in the chest slot it provides a small amount of protection. The robes can be dyed and $(item)enchanted$(). It can be repaired by using $(item)Leather$() in an $(item)Anvil$() or by crafting with four $(l:resources/impregnated_leather)Impregnated Leather$(/l).

pages.title: Special Properties
pages.text: When worn, the Witches Robes provide an improved chance of creating an additional brew when using the $(l:kettle/kettle_intro)Kettle$(/l).$(p)Moreover, the creature that wears the piece is ignored by $(item)Creepers$().$(p)The piece becomes invisible when the creature that wears it is invisible.
